Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

0.5 Red Onion and wash
3 Scallions and wash
2 Garlic Cloves
1 Bell Pepper and wash
2 Zuchinnis and wash
5 Crimini Mushrooms and wash
1 Soy Sauce
2 Pad Thai Sauces
1 Spirilizer
1 Vegetable Oil

Vegan Recipe

Put 3 seconds of 1 Vegetable Oil in pantelligent on 4
Cut 0.5 Red Onion
Cut 3 Scallions
Cut 1 Bell Pepper
Cut 2 Garlic Cloves
Cut 5 Crimini Mushrooms
Wait 7 minutes put vegetables in pan
1 Spirilizer 2 Zuchinnis
Wait 7 minutes
Put sprilized zuchinni in the pan
Wait 2 minutes
Put in 1 x (1 tsp) Soy Sauce
Put in 2 x (1 tbsp) Pad Thai Sauces
